title: Where We're Going to Make Impact
subtitle: Starting our journey soon

currentStatus.title: Our Progress
items: Building our network of verified medical professionals
Developing our platform for seamless care delivery
Engaging with communities and residential societies

launch.title: Launching Soon
launch.text: We're preparing to launch in select metro cities, bringing immediate, verified medical care to urban homes where it's needed most.

expansion.title: Our Vision
expansion.text: Our mission is to bring quality healthcare to homes across urban India - making medical care accessible to everyone, everywhere, whenever they need it.
